subject: Talked a bit about Frank's Box, Chris Moon, and the 12-469 mod on my show
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Last night on Ghost to Ghost PM I welcomed very special guest Kris 
Bronson, a.k.a. The Rocker Chick. For a full 2 hours Kris Bronson 
(The Rocker Chick) talked exhilaration ghost stories and told us 
about what's new in the field of the paranormal. Kris discussed her 
recent investigation of The Stanley Hotel, and what it's really like 
to search for spirits with our favorite celebrity ghost hunters. How 
she lives in a haunted house and what she sees and hears. About her 
scientific approach to a paranormal investigation.And she answered 
callers questions, as well as discussed some new EVP audio findings.
We even talked a bit about Frank's Box, Chris Moon, and the 12-469 
mod on the show.
Hear it all NOW at

http://www.ghosttoghostpm.com

Kris' websites where you can find her videos, photos and writings:
Kris' MySpace page:
http://www.myspace.com/the_rocker_chick1
Kris' YouTube page:
http://www.youtube.com/therockerchick1

- Mike
